Posted By: gtamaster503 (8/16/2011 6:48:30 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
A lesson for WotC that making cards that lets you play stuff from your library directly should be avoided at all costs. See what happened to [Stoneforge Mystic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stoneforge Mystic)  
  
Have seen this end the game on turn 3:  
  
Turn 1: Forest, [Llanowar Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Elves), [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter)  
Turn 2: Island, [Tinker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tinker), get [Blightsteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightsteel Colossus)  
Turn 3: Swing for victory if opponent can't stop your colossus  
  
Alll in all this card is broken as the base of a combo and rightfully banned
posts.html:
A lesson for WotC that making cards that lets you play stuff from your library directly should be avoided at all costs. See what happened to Stoneforge Mystic

Have seen this end the game on turn 3:

Turn 1: Forest, Llanowar Elves, Ornithopter
Turn 2: Island, Tinker, get Blightsteel Colossus
Turn 3: Swing for victory if opponent can't stop your colossus

Alll in all this card is broken as the base of a combo and rightfully banned

Ill go ahead and rate this card .5/5 for balancing. I expect my comment rating to be .5/5 in a few days, everyone is all HUR DUR, SO BROKEN, 5/5 RATING
